name: Gerrymander (mciverar)
description:
The goal of this game is to group all the voting blocks into districts.  The party with the most voters in each district gets the vote.  The party with the most districts once the board is filled wins.  Be careful, though, as disregarding the natural boundaries in the region is a dead giveaway for Gerrymandering.

Play through premade levels or see how far you can get in Endless Mode playing on procedurally generated boards (currently not all boards generated in Endless Mode result in a winnable scenario).

Music: "cutie" by DOVETAILS

This game is being developed for submission to My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.
